name: Moots AI
long_description: Moots AI is the AI CRM & Networking App built for ambitious founders, sales executives, and connectors who grow their business through relationships. It syncs with your Iphone Contacts, Gmail, and Google Calendar, then builds rich dossiers on the people you meet (prospects, clients, investors...). You can add notes, voice memos, tags, and context. Your AI Chief of Staff remembers everything and uses it to surface opportunities, draft outreach, and help you act at the perfect moment.
